title: Gragas Barrel Roll (Q) doesn't work
body:
While I was playing a ranked game with Gragas, a random bug occured.
I was on the top lane using my Q, but I didn't see the barrel appearing. Then I had cooldown on my Q and couldn't use it for the rest of the game with the message you can see in the attachements.

replies.body: Bro this is the german board if you dont talk about Sauerkraut and Bier you gonna have a bad time

> Bro this is the german board if you dont talk about Sauerkraut and Bier you gonna have a bad time

#ROFL
I thought at least the bug section was serious...my bad, no chance to find such a place in this community.
